full_output.summary: As a recent BTech graduate with a strong passion for innovative technology, I bring a blend of academic excellence and practical project experience. My academic journey has been complemented by hands-on learning, particularly in the realm of emerging technologies. Eager to embrace new challenges, I am committed to excellence and driven by a relentless pursuit of knowledge to contribute to driving innovation forward.

projects.name: Hostel Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Hostel management system using C++, which aims to manage hostel accommodations for students more efficiently by automating the registration and allocation of hostel rooms and automated billing functionalities. This project showcased proficiency in object-oriented programming.

projects.name: Video Conferencing Website
projects.description: Developed a real-time video conferencing application using modern technologies such as React.js, Next.js, and GetStream.io. Implemented features for seamless video communication, and secure user authentication using Clerk.

projects.name: Weather Forecasting
projects.description: Its primary objective is to create and apply machine learning models that are specifically suited to different areas of weather forecasting, such as medium- and long-range predictions, long-term climate projections, and short-term nowcasting. Our machine learning models seek to identify complex patterns and correlations in the atmosphere to enable more accurate and timely forecasts. They do this by utilizing historical weather data, satellite imagery, radar observations, and atmospheric model outputs.

experiences.description: Participated in a virtual internship program offered by APSSDC specializing in Data Analysis. Completed a hands-on project that enhanced skills in data manipulation, visualization, and problem-solving. This inaugural experience has laid a solid groundwork for my future career aspirations.

Using Machine Learning algorithms for training, Federated Learning and Blockchain. In the healthcare industry, maintaining the privacy and security of sensitive patient data is of utmost importance. Blockchain technology, with its decentralized and immutable nature, offers a promising solution to address these concerns. By storing healthcare data on a blockchain, it becomes tamper-proof and transparent, ensuring that only authorized individuals can access and modify it.

full_output.name: Thirupathamma Darawathu
